properties.Name: Dobulu
properties.description: Dobulu is named after the rolling hills near the town. Our team conducted walking tours with the local geography teacher and school children. Students learned how mapping and the placement of features such as water canals and key buildings were important. Scroll the photo back and forth to see the edits made to the online map on OpenStreetMap.org during our fieldwork.
properties.caption: <iframe frameborder="0" class="juxtapose" width="100%" height="400" src="https://cdn.knightlab.com/libs/juxtapose/latest/embed/index.html?uid=cb0d942e-ec11-11e7-b263-0edaf8f81e27"></iframe>

properties.Name: Salkyn-Tor State Park
properties.description: Salkyn Tor is a park with a dedicated area for picknicking and a large nature reserve. We interviewed the park management and rangers to learn about wildlife and ecological experiments. We also collected GPS points on horseback trips into the park and converted the park staff's map into digital form.
properties.caption: Overlooking the valley from Salkyn Tor Park while collecting GPS points and monitoring wildlife.

properties.Name: Naryn National State Reserve
properties.description: Naryn Reserve is  a heavily protected reserve that is home to snow leopards and ibex. Rangers conduct regular monitoring missions and install trap cameras . We interviewed park staff to identify the pressures the park faces, particularly with lands adjacent to its borders which are used by hunters and pasture users.
properties.caption: Credit: Trip to Kyrgyzstan (triptokyrgyzstan.com)

properties.Name: Eki-Naryn
properties.description: Eki-Naryn is a town located near the merging of two major rivers. We worked with the geography teacher and students to map the village. We also mapped the surrounding high pastures with herders and learned of traditional migration routes for animals. Scroll the photo back and forth to see the edits made to the online map on OpenStreetMap.org during our fieldwork.
properties.caption: <iframe frameborder="0" class="juxtapose" width="100%" height="400" src="https://cdn.knightlab.com/libs/juxtapose/latest/embed/index.html?uid=f112e128-ea82-11e7-b263-0edaf8f81e27"></iframe>

properties.Name: Naryn City
properties.description: Naryn City is the provincial capital and served as our base of operations. Students from the University of Central Asia in Naryn acted as research assistants and helped facilitate mapping sessions in the villages, while also digitizing and mapping collected data. We also interviewed the management of the two nearby parks, whose offices are located in Naryn City.
properties.caption: Working with undergraduate students from the University of Central Asia to digitize collected features from paper maps to OSM.
